description: Official Google AI blog posts and announcements

items.title: 9 fun questions to try asking Google Photos
items.description: Learn more about Google Photos’ new Ask button as well as other functions of its Ask Photos feature.

items.title: Helping kids and teens learn and grow online on Safer Internet Day
items.description: We’re sharing our latest updates designed to support families, kids and teens in the digital world.

items.title: Natively Adaptive Interfaces: A new framework for AI accessibility
items.description: Learn how Google's NAI framework uses AI to make technology more adaptive, inclusive and helpful for everyone.

items.title: How Google Cloud is helping Team USA elevate their tricks with AI
items.description: Google Cloud built an industry-first AI tool to help U.S. Ski and Snowboard athletes.

items.title: Watch our new Gemini ad ahead of football’s biggest weekend
items.description: Learn more about Google’s new ad that will run during football’s Big Game on February 8.

items.title: The latest AI news we announced in January
items.description: Google AI announcements from January

items.title: How we’re helping preserve the genetic information of endangered species with AI
items.description: Scientists are working to sequence the genome of every known species on Earth.

items.title: Advancing AI benchmarking with Game Arena
items.description: We’re expanding Game Arena with Poker and Werewolf, while Gemini 3 Pro and Flash top our chess leaderboard.

items.title: Project Genie: Experimenting with infinite, interactive worlds
items.description: Google AI Ultra subscribers in the U.S. can now try out Project Genie.

items.title: Hear more about interactive world models in our latest podcast.
items.description: The latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast focuses on Genie 3, a real-time, interactive world model. Host Logan Kilpatrick chats with Diego Rivas, Shlomi…

items.title: Google AI Plus is now available everywhere our AI plans are available, including the U.S.
items.description: We’re launching Google AI Plus in 35 new countries and territories including the US, making it available everywhere Google AI plans are available.

items.title: Just ask anything: a seamless new Search experience
items.description: Search users around the world now have easier access to frontier AI capabilities.

items.title: In our latest podcast, hear how the “Smoke Jumpers” team brings Gemini to billions of people.
items.description: Bringing Gemini to billions of users requires a massive, coordinated infrastructure effort. In the latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kil…

items.title: How animators and AI researchers made ‘Dear Upstairs Neighbors’
items.description: Today, our animated short film, “Dear Upstairs Neighbors,” previews at the Sundance Film Festival.

items.title: Personal Intelligence in AI Mode in Search: Help that's uniquely yours
items.description: Personal Intelligence lets you tap into your context from Gmail and Photos to deliver tailored responses in Search, just for you.

items.title: Building a community-led future for AI in film with Sundance Institute
items.description: A look at how Sundance Institute will build a community-led ecosystem for AI education and empowerment, to support creatives.

items.title: How Nano Banana got its name
items.description: We’re peeling back the origin story of Nano Banana, one of Google DeepMind’s most popular models.

items.title: Learners and educators are AI’s new “super users”
items.description: Google’s 2025 Our Life with AI survey found people are using AI tools to learn new things.

items.title: Introducing Community Benchmarks on Kaggle
items.description: Community Benchmarks on Kaggle lets the community build, share and run custom evaluations for AI models.

items.title: Announcing the winner of the Global AI Film Award
items.description: Over the past year, we’ve witnessed how creators globally have been using our AI models and tools to share their stories with the world. That’s why we launched the AI Fi…
